description: This source file provides a stub implementation for a Supabase client within a FastAPI backend project. It includes a function to retrieve a placeholder client object if Supabase is enabled and configured, otherwise returns None. The file serves as a minimal placeholder with instructions for future integration.

methods.name: Optional[Any] get_supabase()
methods.description: Returns a placeholder Supabase client object if enabled and configured; otherwise returns None. Checks configuration conditions and constructs a stub client dictionary.
